UserHandler
public class UserHandler
extends java.lang.Object

    • users

      public static java.util.ArrayList<User> users

  • Constructor Details

    • UserHandler

      public UserHandler()
      create a new file and a text file inside it to save the users data in. and load any old users if the file already exists

  • Method Details

    • getUserByName

      public static User getUserByName​(java.lang.String name)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Return the user if exists

    • checkIfExists

      public boolean checkIfExists​(java.lang.String username)
      check if the user is registered before and return true if existing
      Parameters:
      username - the user name to be searched for in the user object
      Returns:
      true if the email exist

    • adduser

      public void adduser​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String e, java.lang.String pass, java.lang.String aType)
      this method register a new user
      Parameters:
      name - user's name
      e - user's email
      pass - user's password
      aType - user's type (owner/player)

    • signIn

      public boolean signIn​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String pass)
      this method check if the email and password given are valid and set that user as the current user
      Parameters:
      userName - user's Name
      pass - user's password
      Returns:
      true if signIn is successful

    • insertUser

      public void insertUser()
      add the new user to the database file

    • loadUsers

      public void loadUsers()
      this method loads all the users data and set them in User class objects then adds them to the users arraylist
